title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Scale agent tools with Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Gateway (AIM3313)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Gateway 扩展代理工具 (AIM3313)
abstract: Unlock AI agent potential with this advanced session on scaling tools using Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Gateway. Learn to build and manage secure, production-ready agent tool environments. We'll cover multi-tenant architecture, deployment strategies, and integration patterns for agentic tools. Explore zero-code MCP tool creation with intelligent tool discovery. Gain insights on security controls, monitoring, and performance optimization for enterprise-scale agent tool ecosystems.
abstract_cn: 通过这个关于使用Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Gateway扩展工具的高级会议，释放AI代理的潜力。学习构建和管理安全的、生产就绪的代理工具环境。我们将涵盖多租户架构、部署策略以及代理工具的集成模式。探索具有智能工具发现功能的零代码MCP工具创建。获得关于企业级代理工具生态系统的安全控制、监控和性能优化的见解。

presenter.name: Dhawal Patel
presenter.title: Tech Lead - Principal Generative AI Architect
